0 // Start in background 
0 // Default monitor
1 // V-Sync factor (0 unlimited, 1 for full monitor refresh rate, 2 for half, etc...)
0 0 0 255 // Background Color (R G B A)

15000 // Time between setting changes (milliseconds)
120 // Number of frames when a setting transition happens
